380-412 Herkimer Street, south side, betwcen Kingston to Albany Aves. TThe view shows the Brooklyn Nursery and Infants Hospital of the Salvation

704868f-a.text:
Herkimer Street, west from Kingston Avenue. On the south side of the street, but actually not seen here, is the Brooklyn Orphan
Asylum grounds.
September 13. 1940
P. L. Sperr
